mapper.sql: headline_id, headline_examination_id, headline_headline_subject, headline_examination_content, headline_question_count, headline_score, headline_pattern, headline_answer_pattern, headline_sort,headline_question_type
mapper.select: select ,examination_subject headline_examination_name from headline,examination where headline_examination_id = examination_id AND headline_id = #{headlineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into headline (headline_id, headline_examination_id, headline_headline_subject, headline_examination_content, headline_question_count, headline_score, headline_pattern, headline_answer_pattern, headline_sort,headline_question_type) values (#{headlineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headlineExaminationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headlineHeadlineSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headlineExaminationContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headlineQuestionCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{headlineScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{headlinePattern,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{headlineAnswerPattern,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{headlineSort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{headlineQuestionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update headline
headline_examination_id = #{headlineExaminationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
